title: added figsize args to surf plotting functions
added figsize args to surf plotting functions

text:
I believe that you can pass in a figure as an argument. This would be the
right way of solving the original problem, and not adding an argument.

Comming back to this PR: I was wrong (my apologies), you cannot pass the figure.

However, I would prefer if we could pass a figure, rather than a figsize, because this is how it's implemented in the volume plotting functions.

>I believe that you can pass in a figure as an argument.

This means that we can pass user defined figure directly as a kwarg or add an argument "figure" rather than figsize like other plotting functions. If figure is None we take default otherwise user given figure ?
